title: Reduced - (2 remaining) T206 cards, shipping discount available

posts.post_title: Reduced - (2 remaining) T206 cards, shipping discount available
posts.post_content:
I have the following T206 cards available for purchase. Shipping will be $3.00. Accepting Paypal only. 

Looking to sell these, so I am offering the following discount for larger purchase: Buy 2 or more cards, free shipping.  Commitment to buy snags these cards, and I will ship promptly and securely in a padded envelope.

Brian

Barry  $42 (way oversized...don't get any funny ideas)
Donlin  $48  SOLD
Spade  $10  SOLD
Dessau  BVG1  $28  (stamp on back - and scanned real poorly)  SOLD
Marshall GAI2.5  $29

PM sent on dessau

Sent from my SM-N960U using Tapatalk

Brian
